about_the_game:
Mature Content Description

This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
and inappropriate for viewing in the workplace.
Characters, storyline and action are fictitious.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

non-consensual sex
Extreme play

All characters must be 18 years of age or older.

★caution★
All text in this game has been translated by machine translation.

■story■
Akihiro is staying at his brother and sister-in-law's house, and one day,
Hisane was nagging me about getting a job.
At that time, the smartphone he was carrying received and a "hypnosis application
was installed on he phone. He raised his voice at the suspicious attitude.
She was angry, but the moment she put her phone in front of her, the app started up.
Then Suddenly, Hissane hugs Akihiro and calls him her brother, Takahiro.
Then, in front of the bewildered Akihiro, she took off her clothes and knelt down to give him a blowjob.

He realized that this was the function of the "hypnosis app,
to which various functions were added from that day onward, to
She was becoming meat hole wife without noticing it.

◆Content warning◆

general adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals over the age of 18.
This includes nudity, sex scenes,non-consensual sex,BDSM, overtly sexual images, and images with a sexual connotation.
Do not play this game if you are not yet 18 years of age or if you are visiting from a country or region where adult content is specifically prohibited by law.

name: NTR with hypnosis application

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: Turning my sister-in-law into a meat hole wife using a hypnosis app
